sourcesContent: handleFileUpload = (event) => { const file = event.target.files[0]; // get the uploaded file const reader = new FileReader(); // create a new file reader reader.onload = () => { const fileData = reader.result; // get the file data as a base64-encoded string localStorage.setItem('uploadedFile', fileData); // save the file data to local storage }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); // read the uploaded file as a data URL }; const uploadedFileData = localStorage.getItem('uploadedFile');
